game

Class CAH_Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.CAH_Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class CAH_Game
extends Object
implements Runnable
    A class of object that represents a Cards Against Humanity game.
    Since:
    CAH1.0(incomplete)
    Version:
    CAH1.0(Incomplete)
    Author:
    Holt Maki

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AnswerCard[][] answers
      The Array of array lists of Cards played by each player that keeps track of who played what card The 2D aspect of it is to make it work for pick 2's and pick 3's
      private int CzarCount
      Serves as a counter for which player is card czar
      private boolean first
      Says if its the first time through
      private Deck gameDeck
      This is the deck that the game is played with
      private ArrayList<Player> players
      The list of players playing the game
      private int roundCount
      Serves as a counter for the number of rounds of CAH that have been played
      private Rules ruleSet
      The set of rules that the game will use

    • Constructor Detail

      • CAH_Game

        public CAH_Game(Rules rules,
        DeckBuilder a,
        ArrayList<Player> players)
        Creates an object that represents a Cards Against Humanity game.
        Parameters:
        rules - - the set of rules that the game uses.
        a - - the deck builder used to build the deck right now the deck builder can't change, but eventually will be different depending on what expansion decks are used.
        players - - the players that are playing the game
        Since:
        CAH1.0

    • Method Detail

      • addRando

        public void addRando()
        Adds Rando Cardrissian to the game if the game is being played with the Rule Rando Cardrissian.
        Since:
        CAH1.0

        Since:
        CAH1.0;

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(Player leavingPlayer)
        Removes a player from the game.
          NOTE: The game needs to store the points of the player so that if the player wants to join again they get back their points
        Parameters:
        leavingPlayer - - The player that is leaving the game.
        Since:
        CAH1.0(Incomplete method) - see coments

      • deal_Draw

        public void deal_Draw()
        Deals AnswerCards to all the players.
        Since:
        CAH1.0

      • draw_Extra

        public void draw_Extra(QuestionCard qCard)
        Deals AnswerCards to all the players. In this method the players are allowed to temporararily to have more cards in their hand than the limit. This method may be used in every round as it checks for draw to see if the number of cards to be drawn over the limit.
        Parameters:
        qCard - - The QuestionCard that is being checked for the variable draw. This should be the current question card.
        Since:
        CAH1.0

      • getQCard

        public QuestionCard getQCard()
        Gets the question card that the players will be playing answer cards for.
        Returns:
        currentQuestionCard - The question card that players will be answering.
        Since:
        CAH1.0

      • getAnswerCards

        public AnswerCard[][] getAnswerCards(int[][] playerCards)
        Gets the players answer cards that they play. Scrambles the cards so that the Card Czar doesn't know who played what. Saves the cards in answers so that we know who played what card. (Doesnt exist needs to be made)
        Parameters:
        playerCards - - the array of arrays containing players card choices
        Returns:
        scrPlayerCards - the answer cards that are played by each player.
        Since:
        CAH1.0

      • scorePoints

        public void scorePoints(AnswerCard[] winner)
                 throws CardNotFoundException
        Gives points to the player that played the winning answer card.
        Parameters:
        winner - - the winning AnswerCard.
        Throws:
        CardNotFoundException - thrown if the AnswerCard[] that is a paramater is not found in answers.
        Since:
        CAH1.0
